description.en: The three words that best describe Mr. Grinchie are as follows: 'STINK, STANK, STUNK!'. He's a three decker saurkraut and toadstool sandwich… with arsenic sauce!
description.ar: The three words that best describe Mr. Grinchie are as follows: 'STINK, STANK, STUNK!'. He's a three decker saurkraut and toadstool sandwich… with arsenic sauce!
description.br: As três palavras que melhor descrevem o Sr. Grinchie são as seguintes: 'FEDOR, FUTUM, GAMBÁ!'. Ele é um sanduíche de chucrute de três andares e cogumelo... com molho de arsênico!
description.cns: 最能形容格林奇先生的三个词如下：“臭，臭，臭！”。他是三层酸菜和毒菌三明治……加砒霜酱！
description.de: Dieser kleine Grinch hebt Gegenstände für dich auf... Nur für unartige Kinder.
description.fi: The three words that best describe Mr. Grinchie are as follows: 'STINK, STANK, STUNK!'. He's a three decker saurkraut and toadstool sandwich… with arsenic sauce!
description.fil: The three words that best describe Mr. Grinchie are as follows: 'STINK, STANK, STUNK!'. He's a three decker saurkraut and toadstool sandwich… with arsenic sauce!
description.fr: En plus d'être abominable, ce familier ramassera les objets laissés par les ennemis !
description.id: Tiga kata yang paling tepat untuk menggambarkan Mr. Grinchie adalah: 'STINK, STANK, STUNK!'. Dia seperti sandwich tumpuk tiga berisi kubis parut dan jamur payung… ditambah saus arsenik!
description.it: The three words that best describe Mr. Grinchie are as follows: 'STINK, STANK, STUNK!'. He's a three decker saurkraut and toadstool sandwich… with arsenic sauce!
description.jp: Mr.グリンチーを召喚・帰還させることができます。Mr.グリンチーと、一見かわいらしい名前ですが、表現に最適な言葉は、「臭い、臭い、臭い！」です。ザワークラウトとヒキガエルのサンドイッチ...そこにヒ素ソースをかけたものなのだ！
description.kr: 비스를 장착 시 해당 능력치를 캐릭터에게 부여하며, 주변의 아이템을 자동 습득 합니다.
description.nl: The three words that best describe Mr. Grinchie are as follows: 'STINK, STANK, STUNK!'. He's a three decker saurkraut and toadstool sandwich… with arsenic sauce!
description.pl: The three words that best describe Mr. Grinchie are as follows: 'STINK, STANK, STUNK!'. He's a three decker saurkraut and toadstool sandwich… with arsenic sauce!
description.ru: Этот Гринч не собирается похищать Рождество - напротив, он сделает его радостным и веселым! Он будет послушно ходить за вами и подбирать предметы. Его ошейник можно украсить бусинами, которые повысят ваши характеристики.
description.sp: Las tres palabras que mejor describen al Mr. Grinchie son las siguientes: '¡Apesta, apesta, apesta!'. Es un sándwich de chucrut de tres pisos y seta venenosa... ¡con salsa de arsénico!
description.sw: The three words that best describe Mr. Grinchie are as follows: 'STINK, STANK, STUNK!'. He's a three decker saurkraut and toadstool sandwich… with arsenic sauce!
description.th: คำสามคำที่อธิบายคุณกรินชีได้ดีที่สุดมีดังนี้: 'เหม็น เหม็น เหม็น!' เขาเป็นซาวเคราท์สามชั้นและแซนวิชเห็ดมีพิษ… กับซอสสารหนู!
description.tw: 召喚或解除聖誕格林奇
description.vi: Ba từ miêu tả chính xác nhất về ông Grinchie như sau: 'STINK, STANK, STUNK!'. Anh ấy là một chiếc bánh mì saurkraut ba tầng và bánh mì kẹp cóc… với nước sốt thạch tín!
